about_the_game: Ari's Journey is a unique game. It captures the soul of a precision platformer in a top-down space game. You have to try it to believe it. The Ari's Journey demo provides chapter 1 and chapter 3 and lets you try any room in those chapters to see it for yourself. Try it out, you have nothing to lose!
